byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Scott Tong, Kai Ryssdal and Steve Gardner
teaser: You think our housing collapse was bad? Try thinking about what the homesteaders went through 100 years ago. Our series looking at the consumer economy continues. Also, the Supreme Court decides that human genes can't be patented.
description: You think our housing collapse was bad? Try thinking about what the homesteaders went through 100 years ago. Our series looking at the consumer economy continues. Also, the Supreme Court decides that human genes can't be patented.
title: Marketplace for Thursday, June 13, 2013
